model.interfaces

Interface PlayingCard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayingCardImpl

    public interface PlayingCard
     Interface for representing a PlayingCard.
 Setting card score is handled by the implementing class constructor(s).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PlayingCard.Suit
      The possible suits for the cards.
      static class  PlayingCard.Value
      The possible values for the cards.

    • Method Detail

      • getSuit

        PlayingCard.Suit getSuit()
        Getter for the card's suit attribute.
        Returns:
        the suit of this card based on PlayingCard.Suit

      • getValue

        PlayingCard.Value getValue()
        Getter for the card's value attribute.
        Returns:
        the face value of this card based on PlayingCard.Value

      • getScore

        int getScore()
        Getter for the card's score attribute.
        Returns:
        the score value of this card (A = 11; J, Q, K = 10; all others of face value)

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
         Overridden Object.toString() method.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a human readable String that lists the values of this PlayingCard instance. e.g. "Suit: Clubs, Value: Five, Score: 5" for Five of Clubs. Note: Case matches as above.

      • equals

        boolean equals(PlayingCard card)
        Method to evaluate whether two cards are equal.
        Parameters:
        card - another card to compare with
        Returns:
        true if the face value and suit is equal

      • equals

         Overridden Object.equals(Object) method.
 Note: The implementation should cast and call through to the type checked method above
        Overrides:
